title: Instructional Design Workshop for Integrating Regional Culture into Elementary English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational English teaching methodologies and instructional design models, along with elementary education environment experience
context.additional_context: Program strengthening capacity to design culture-based English curricula for pre-service teachers and educational practitioners

learning_goals: Learners create elementary English lesson designs reflecting local culture by applying the Dick and Carey model.
Learners develop educational materials integrating language activities and local cultural elements using Byram’s cultural classification framework.
Learners submit instructional design outputs incorporating peer feedback and self-reflection through project-based assessment.

resources: Dick and Carey instructional design model template
Access to Local Cultural Content Database
Zoom Collaboration Tools (Breakout Rooms, Whiteboard, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
